meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed busulfan to help fight the cancer.
meanings.sent2: Patients often receive busulfan to combat their illness.
meanings.sent3: The busulfan bottle and the cancer cells had a serious showdown.
meanings.sent4: Like a warrior, busulfan attacks the cancer cells relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: Busulfan is like a brave soldier fighting against the enemy within the body.

meanings.definition: To administer busulfan as part of a cancer treatment regimen.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will busulfan the patient before the surgery.
meanings.sent2: Doctors busulfan the patients to help them recover.
meanings.sent3: The hospital staff busulfaned the patients with precision and care.
meanings.sent4: Busulfaning the treatment plan ensured the best possible outcome.
meanings.sent5: The medical team busulfans the medication to save lives every day.
